name: racquetball
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] a game played in an enclosed playing area between two or four people who use rackets to hit a small rubber ball against a wall: They meet to play racquetball once a week. He challenged me to a game of racquetball.
Bill Oxford/E+/GettyImages
[ C ] the ball used in the game of racquetball: I was hit in the face by a racquetball.
Patryk_Kosmider/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesHe pulled a muscle in his back playing racquetball.His workout plan consisted of weightlifting, sprints, distance running, and racquetball. The building contains a racquetball court.She's an excellent racquetball player.You could build up strength by squeezing a racquetball.
